title: Lin-Manuel Miranda | Mike Lindell Fails to File Big SCOTUS Case He Promised by Thanksgiving: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at the January 6 committee subpoenaing another round of Trump allies as multiple investigations of the former president and his inner circle intensify.

Then, Lin-Manuel Miranda talks about directing the film adaptation of Tick, Tick…Boom!, populating the film with cameos from Jonathan Larson's heroes and Stephen Sondheim rewriting and recording a voicemail.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
